info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 12 at 5:00PM EDT until July 12 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN CARBON AND WESTERN MONROE COUNTIES... At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Christmans, or 10 miles northeast of Lehighton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Pocono, Tobyhanna, Jim Thorpe, Weatherly, Brodheadsville, Kunkletown, Pocono Pines, Gilbert, Pocono Raceway, Lake Harmony, Tannersville, Mountainhome, Rossland, Long Pond, Albrightsville, Kresgeville, Sun Valley, Arrowhead Lake, Jonas and Meckesville. This includes the following highways... Northeast Extension between mile markers 78 and 94. Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 280 and 305. Interstate 380 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 9. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
